channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: Yuezheng Ling is Now Available in Zyon And Much More!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Since the beginning, a few of Vsinger‘s characters were available in Zyon, such as Luo Tianyi and Yanhe, but now, we have another addition to the list of VOCALOID characters available in Zyon! Alongside VOCALOIDs like Luo Tianyi, YanHe, Mayu, Zing as well as the Alter/Ego ALYS, we now have the option of Yuezheng Ling! …

The post Yuezheng Ling is Now Available in Zyon And Much More! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Since the beginning, a few of Vsinger‘s characters were available in Zyon, such as Luo Tianyi and Yanhe, but now, we have another addition to the list of VOCALOID characters available in Zyon! Alongside VOCALOIDs like Luo Tianyi, YanHe, Mayu, Zing as well as the Alter/Ego ALYS, we now have the option of Yuezheng Ling! There is also several other of Zyon’s characters available as well as multiple themes for each VOCALOIDs and other characters.

Login and Leader-boards

There have been many updates to Zyon recently. Unlike previously, were you did not need a login, now you can create an account and login. Although you do not need to login, you can play in offline mode, but you will not have access to all of the features. Also note that everyone’s score has been reset for online mode, if you check offline mode, your old scores will be saved. Along with this, there is now a revamped ranking system built in the game. The skill and score ranking is still there, however now we have a leader-board for each song that you are able to see before playing.

Events

For those of you who have played other rhythm games like Love Live! School Idol Festival and Dynamix, you should be familiar with this system, Zyon now has an event system as well! Essentially, for a limited period of time you can play a certain amount of songs that give you rewards, these include; Songs, characters, tokens and so on. You can collect these by clearing each song in the event were you will then select one of 3 random tokens. Once selected it will generate an item for the one chosen.

Summons

Another new feature is the summon, every some many hours you will be able to do one summon for free, at which you will receive one item at random. If you would like to speed up the summon process you may use some items in order to do it again. Best of luck!

Daily login bonus

If you login everyday you will receive a different bonus of different items. Make sure to login when you can to collect these!

Gameplay

If you would like to see Yuezheng’s theme in action, look no further! I (Monds) have uploaded a video for you guys featuring one of the new songs “普通DISCO (Ordinary DISCO)” by ilem. Other VOCALOID songs included in this new update are “Nyanyanyanyanyanyanya” Mayu version as well as “飞跃乌托邦 (Fly over Utopia)” by 动点P.

For all other information on Zyon check out our other article here.

Links

iOS App Store

Android Google Play 

For all future updates, you can follow them on their official Facebook page.

 

The post Yuezheng Ling is Now Available in Zyon And Much More! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: ALYS and Yan Xi Available on Zyon!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
A new update is now available on Zyon, and this time around, it is the French virtual singer ALYS, created by VoxWave! The pack includes the songs “Hajime Ni,” “SHARDS,” “Neutrino,” and “Sous Cette Pluie” performed by ALYS as well as her very own theme. You also have a chance to win a “Zyon Emblem” which …

The post ALYS and Yan Xi Available on Zyon! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A new update is now available on Zyon, and this time around, it is the French virtual singer ALYS, created by VoxWave! The pack includes the songs “Hajime Ni,” “SHARDS,” “Neutrino,” and “Sous Cette Pluie” performed by ALYS as well as her very own theme.

You also have a chance to win a “Zyon Emblem” which gives you access to all of the songs by sharing Zyon‘s Facebook post.

New update featuring ALYS theme for free.Come and see this sweet French virtual idol performing her wonderful voice in…

Posted by Zyon 載音 on Friday, May 26, 2017

Another recent addition to Zyon is Yan Xi. Who is Yan Xi, you ask? Yan Xi is a Chinese virtual singer from the MUTA synthesizer software.

On top of all this, several new Luo Tianyi and YanHe songs have also been made available!

Zyon is currently available on Android and iOS.

For more information on Zyon, check out our page here.

Official Links

VoxWave’s Website
Yan Xi’s Website

The post ALYS and Yan Xi Available on Zyon! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: The Mobile Rhythm Game《Zyon》& EXIT TUNES Have Just Opened MAYU’s Special Event
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Powered by EXIT TUNES, the largest Japanese ACG record company and the mobile rhythm game《Zyon》have just released their newest update featuring EXIT TUNES’ VOCALOID “MAYU“. As a rhythm game focusing on original music and VOCALOID-licensed songs, Zyon has had a great start since its iOS launch in November 2015 and Android release in April 2016. …

The post The Mobile Rhythm Game《Zyon》& EXIT TUNES Have Just Opened MAYU’s Special Event appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Powered by EXIT TUNES, the largest Japanese ACG record company and the mobile rhythm game《Zyon》have just released their newest update featuring EXIT TUNES’ VOCALOID “MAYU“.

As a rhythm game focusing on original music and VOCALOID-licensed songs, Zyon has had a great start since its iOS launch in November 2015 and Android release in April 2016. With a strong demand from fans, this is the first time Zyon is featuring a Japanese VOCALOID character as well as some popular Japanese VOCALOID songs.

This event will be divided into four parts. A lot of EXIT TUNES-licensed VOCALOID songs can be experienced and purchased on Zyon’s store, most of which are top hits on Niconico.

The legendary VOCALOID songs in “MAYU PACK 1” include:

「炉心融解」(Meltdown) (iroha feat. MAYU)

「吉原ラメント」(Yoshiwara Lament) (亜沙 MAYU)

「ぽっぴっぽー」(Popipo) (ラマーズP feat. MAYU)

「夕立のりぼん」(Yuudachi no Ribbon) (みきとP feat. MAYU)

The production company of Zyon has released a specially designed MAYU theme and user interface featuring an animated MAYU. You can watch the trailer below to have a better idea on how it looks.

Also, to celebrate Zyon’s bond with MAYU, Zyon’s Facebook page in collaboration with VNN is going to be holding a giveaway event. We will be giving out 10 signed MAYU CDs and post cards, all of which will be signed by some of the most famous Japanese VOCALOID producers. These include 164, 亜沙, and Mikito-P.

How to Enter
– Comment your favorite VOCALOID song of any VOCALOID in the comment section of the VNN or Zyon’s official Facebook.
– Share the post.
– VNN and Zyon will each be giving away 5 prizes! (All links can be found below.)

For more information on Zyon, click here.

Zyon iOS Download

Zyon Android Download

MAYU’s Official Website

EXIT TUNES’ Official Website

Zyon’s Official Facebook Page

VNN

The post The Mobile Rhythm Game《Zyon》& EXIT TUNES Have Just Opened MAYU’s Special Event appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Zyon YouTube Challenge
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The creators of Zyon are launching their first "Players Performance" event. This event will take place from May 6th until May 21st.

Rules

Upload your video to YouTube or Facebook.
Post the link in the comment section here (showing your hand movement is preferred).
Videos will not be judged based on skill but rather

The post Zyon YouTube Challenge appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The creators of Zyon are launching their first “Players Performance” event. This event will take place from May 6th until May 21st.

Rules

  • Upload your video to YouTube or Facebook.
  • Post the link in the comment section here (showing your hand movement is preferred).
  • Videos will not be judged based on skill but rather creativity and originality.
  • Things such as playing the song with one hand, in a group, and songs such as “Sakura Fubuki” are encouraged.
  • Views, likes, and engagement will be considered, however this will not be the determining factor in choosing a winner. Creativity is the most important aspect.
  • iOS and Android players are both welcome to participate.
  • You are free to choose any song in any mode for your video.

Prizes

  • 1st place will be featured in Zyon’s staff list and receive a “Nvidia shield” tablet.
  • Top 3 players will receive a signed copy of Mayu’s official album with signatures from famous producers.
  • Top 10 players will be featured on their official website as well as given a Zyon Emblem (unlocks all DLC).
  • All participants will receive a Zing wallpaper.

Make sure to post your video in the comment section of the post below to participate!

The post Zyon YouTube Challenge appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID News Network 2.0 is Live!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Fans of VOCALOID from all over the world have flocked to VNN for their daily dose of VOCALOID news, and VNN is proud to announce that we're kicking it up more than just one notch! Along with our new design and amazing new art, we have new languages and newly announced partners. Welcome to VOCALOID

The post VOCALOID News Network 2.0 is Live! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Fans of VOCALOID from all over the world have flocked to VNN for their daily dose of VOCALOID news, and VNN is proud to announce that we’re kicking it up more than just one notch! Along with our new design and amazing new art, we have new languages and newly announced partners. Welcome to VOCALOID News Network 2.0!

Partners

Zyon

Some savvy fans may have noticed that Zyon is on our radar quite a bit. That’s thanks to Zyon’s creators, Aquatrax, working closely with us so that we can share this awesome game with the world the best we can! And now we can officially announce our partnership with Zyon. Expect to catch a glimpse of our logo in the game!

VOCALOID Talks/ST MEDIA

We’re also proud to announce that we’ll be working closely with UNI’s creators (so closely in fact that they’ll be helping us out with VNN Korea when it launches). We’re going to be THE place for UNI news now!

Mikufan.com

Once again, savvy fans may notice that we’ve linked to Mikufan, a lot. In the interest of growing the community and not competing with the biggest English Miku fan site in existence (if not the biggest Miku fan site in all of the western fandom), we’ve linked to Mikufan articles instead of creating articles on the subjects jrharbort and Mercuryw cover. Now we can officially say that we’re working side by side with Mikufan’s staff to grow the VOCALOID community and provide lots of Miku news!

New Art

We want to throw a HUGE shout out to WeiTu (唯Tu), our new illustrator! His amazing art is featured in our banners and other parts of the site, as well as on all of our social media platforms. Expect to see more work from him soon!

New Languages

Spanish and Japanese speaking fans rejoice! In addition to our strong Indonesian and Chinese versions, we’re proud to announce that VNN will now be available in Japanese and Spanish as well starting today. Korean will also be available in the future thanks to VOCALOID Talks/ST Media, and we plan to launch a French version later this year.

Still the Same VNN

Don’t worry though, fans! Things will still proceed as normal. While we have partners, everyone we work with knows that we’re not going to change. We’d rather work alone than focus on certain VOCALOIDs. You can still expect the same range of coverage as we try to hit every piece of VOCALOID news that reaches us. If anything, we’ll be covering even more now that our team has increased! Everyone on the team has different interests, and together, we’ll be able to find even more news and share it with everyone.

Expect to see a lot more from us in the future, and thank you to everyone who’s visited us so far and those who will visit us in the future. We exist only because of you guys! Without the VOCALOID fandom, we’d be nothing. So let’s keep VOCALOID going!

The post VOCALOID News Network 2.0 is Live! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Zyon is Now Available on Android
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Back in September, the company Aquatrax was developing a game in collaboration with VSinger to create a mobile rhythm game using Chinese VOCALOIDs. It was set to release on iOS first then Android later.

After a few months, in November the iOS version was released and the Android version was set to be released later.

The post Zyon is Now Available on Android appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Back in September, the company Aquatrax was developing a game in collaboration with VSinger to create a mobile rhythm game using Chinese VOCALOIDs. It was set to release on iOS first then Android later.

https://www.facebook.com/aquatraxzyon/videos/800723476703893/”
After a few months, in November the iOS version was released and the Android version was set to be released later.

https://www.facebook.com/aquatraxzyon/videos/882374941872079/”

Aquatrax got straight to working on the Android version after the release of the iOS version. Fans were very eager to get their hands on the Android version.

 

The time has now come to head on over to Google Play on your Android device and download the game for FREE! Just click the icon below to be redirected to the download page.

 

 

If you want to stay up to date on giveaways, contests, and their monthly song pack releases, check out their official Facebook page. You can find more information on the game here.

https://www.facebook.com/aquatraxzyon/

 

The post Zyon is Now Available on Android appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Zyon Android Pre-registration and Release Date
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The mobile VOCALOID rhythm game Zyon will launch on Android devices April 29th. They have opened pre-registrations and are offering rewards based on how many fans join the pre-registration. The rewards will be based on the amount of pre-registrations, and you can find that event below. All you need to do is click "interested" or

The post Zyon Android Pre-registration and Release Date appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The mobile VOCALOID rhythm game Zyon will launch on Android devices April 29th. They have opened pre-registrations and are offering rewards based on how many fans join the pre-registration. The rewards will be based on the amount of pre-registrations, and you can find that event below. All you need to do is click “interested” or “going” and you will be pre-registered for the Android version of the game and receive the rewards.
https://www.facebook.com/events/576126279225086/

Rewards

0-2,000 People Going: 100 Coins.
2,000-5,000 People Going: Kronos (by Sakuzyo) redeem code for FREE.
5,000-8,000 People Going: Millennium recipe song redeem code for FREE.
8,000-10,000 People Going: Primum Mobile (NEW SONG) redeem code for FREE.
10,000-20,000 People Going: Special Luo Tianyi Character redeem code for FREE.
More than 20,000 People Going: Menu Theme for FREE.

For more rewards follow them on twitter and retweet the event on Twitter here.

If you do not have an Android Device, you can find the iOS version on the iOS store.
More information on the game can be found here.

 

For all future updates, head on over to their Facebook page.

https://www.facebook.com/aquatraxzyon/

The post Zyon Android Pre-registration and Release Date appeared first on VNN.

The VOCALOID mobile rhythm game Zyon has teamed up with EXIT TUNES in order to bring Mayu to the game, as well as many of the VOCALOID songs from Exit Tunes. Some of these songs include "Meltdown" by Kagamine Rin and "Nyan Cat". Also, several well-known producers will be featured in the game such as

The post Zyon X Exit Tunes Collaboration appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The VOCALOID mobile rhythm game Zyon has teamed up with EXIT TUNES in order to bring Mayu to the game, as well as many of the VOCALOID songs from Exit Tunes. Some of these songs include “Meltdown” by Kagamine Rin and “Nyan Cat”. Also, several well-known producers will be featured in the game such as LamazeP and iroha.

You can find more information on Zyon here. Also, you can find all updates on their Facebook page. The Android version of the game is on its way as well, so stay tuned!
https://www.facebook.com/aquatraxzyon/

The post Zyon X Exit Tunes Collaboration appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Chinese Vocaloid Rhythm Game Now Available Worldwide on iOS!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The first officially licensed Chinese Vocaloid rhythm game titled Zyon is now available worldwide for iOS devices at the cost of $1.99 USD. For Android users, please be patient as the Android version will be available later this year.

 

The game will include:

More than 40 songs.
Two different play modes, one for the

The post Chinese Vocaloid Rhythm Game Now Available Worldwide on iOS! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The first officially licensed Chinese Vocaloid rhythm game titled Zyon is now available worldwide for iOS devices at the cost of $1.99 USD. For Android users, please be patient as the Android version will be available later this year.

 

The game will include:

  • More than 40 songs.
  • Two different play modes, one for the casual player and the other for the more hardcore.
  • More than 300 various patterns.
  • Various music genres.
  • Leaderboards and achievements.
  • As well as much more!

Purchase the game now and for a limited time get free gifts with your purchase of the game. These gifts include a Luo Tianyi visual theme and a performance theme, as well as a song pack and more!

 

The game can be purchased on the app store here. For future updates on the game you can also follow their official Facebook page.

If you would like more information on the game check out our pre-release article that covers everything in depth here.

The post Chinese Vocaloid Rhythm Game Now Available Worldwide on iOS! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New Rhythm Game Featuring Chinese VOCALOIDs Set for Release Soon!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Note for all the up to date information check out our newest article "What is Zyon" for the download link and up to date information
A new rhythm game featuring Chinese VOCALOIDs titled "Zion" in China and "Zyon" internationally was announced for mobile devices a few months ago. This game is a collaboration between Vsinger

The post New Rhythm Game Featuring Chinese VOCALOIDs Set for Release Soon! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Note for all the up to date information check out our newest article “What is Zyon” for the download link and up to date information
A new rhythm game featuring Chinese VOCALOIDs titled “Zion” in China and “Zyon” internationally was announced for mobile devices a few months ago. This game is a collaboration between Vsinger and Aquatrax.

The game is set to release worldwide for IOS on November 19th and Android at the end of the year.

As shown above songs of Luo Tianyi, YanHe and Yuezheng Ling will be playable. Keep in mind these are only Vsinger’s VOCALOIDs at the moment. Other characters will also be in the game that are not VOCALOIDs.

Some of the songs included are 梦之雨 by Dr.Yun and Scarlet Drop by Rosary.

They will be announcing producers who have contributed their work to the game by country. Places such as Japan, Korea, China, USA and more. (We will update the list as these are revealed.)

Taiwan

  • Hoskey
  • Shi Kuang Lee 李世光
  • 3R2
  • 空氣載體 The AirCarrier

USA

  • Akira Complex

Hong Kong

  • Missionary
  • mmry

Japan

  • sakuzyo（削除）
  • Junk（定額P）
  • Nhato
  • LV.4
  • sky_delta
  • t+pazolite
  • m108
  • KO3
  • scarfaith
  • Radianth

Fun Fact: The game play was influenced by Aquatrax’s logo.

 

UPDATE!

Zyon will have two game play modes, “PURE MODE” and “DUAL MODE”. Each of these modes will have 3 different patterns for each song. Each song will also have the option to play both modes.

PURE MODE is more suitable for those with a tablet or the more experienced in the rhythm game genre.

 

 

DUAL MODE is for the more casual in the genre. In this mode you will only need to press the red and blue buttons on the screen.

 

They have also announced that the game will release with 42 songs; with each mode and pattern this will give the game a total of over 250 various patterns.

UPDATE 2:

The game will have its own story with CG cut-scenes as you progress.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

If this game is of any interest to you, head on over to their Facebook page and show your support!

The post New Rhythm Game Featuring Chinese VOCALOIDs Set for Release Soon! appeared first on VNN.
